attributes.action: Allow grassroots football to continue within local communities.
attributes.additional_details:
Restart grassroots football. 

It is well known that outdoor transmission of the Covid 19 is minimal. All grassroots football clubs have strict guidelines & processes in place to keep football safe. 

Physical health will be maintained or increased during tighter restrictions 

Mental health maintained or increased due to the social aspect of their loved sport.
attributes.background:
Grassroots football has been paused due to the impending national lockdown. This is detrimental to children’s physical and mental health. 
Whilst schools remain open grassroots football should be allowed to continue with the strict measures already put in place.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow Grassroots football to keep going for juniors: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169

Allow outdoor amateur football to continue during lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557467
